api_list.name: Stocks of industry
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hong-kong-stocks.p.rapidapi.com/industries/1/stocks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hong-kong-stocks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hong-kong-stocks.p.rapidapi.com/industries/{industry_id}/stocks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hong-kong-stocks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Stock Fundamentals
api_list.description: Retrieve fundamental data of a stock
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hong-kong-stocks.p.rapidapi.com/stocks/1/fundamentals"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hong-kong-stocks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hong-kong-stocks.p.rapidapi.com/stocks/{code}/fundamentals"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hong-kong-stocks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
